tasks.task: Vertical farming of basil using aeroponics
subtasks: Positioning oneself vertically beside the aeroponic tower
Observing the 44 basil plants in the tower
Confirming the growth medium is water with mineral nutrients
Ensuring plants are grown without soil

tasks.task: Confirming proper aeroponic basil grow system setup
subtasks: Verify the presence and number of basil plants (44)
Confirm the absence of soil and confirmation that water and mineral nutrient solution is used

tasks.task: Inspecting the aeroponic basil grow system
Verifying aeroponic basil grow system integrity
subtasks: Confirm that the correct number of basil plants (44) are present.
Verify that the basil grows without soil, using water and mineral nutrient solution.

tasks.task: Positioning oneself to inspect the aeroponic basil farm
Demonstrate the vertical aeroponic basil grow system
Alternatively, the physical task is being present at the location. If "Right here" means you need to go to that place, then the MAINTASK is "Arriving at the vertical aeroponic basil farm".
Verifying aeroponic basil grow system setup
MAINTASK: Verifying aeroponic basil grow system setup
subtasks: Confirm that the correct number of basil plants (44) are present.
Verify that the basil grows without soil, using water and mineral nutrient solution.
